text: During my time as a student, I instructed three different courses over the course of three quarters. These courses can be found as followed:

Instructed

cooperative user-centered software development practices, emphasizing agile methodologies

and GitHub usage

Taught

weekly lab sessions with 35 students on JavaScript/React,

Unit Testing,

and collaborative work practices

derived from course materials
Supported the professor by developing lectures, facilitating weekly stakeholder meetings, and encouraging student engagement in group activities

Led

two weekly lab sessions with 30 students on Data Collection

, Data Bias

, Privacy, Design, and AI
Collaborated with the professor to teach non-informatics majors about Informatics from ethical and legal standpoints
Managed administrative responsibilities, including organizing lecture notes and assisting in course structure

Collaborated with the professor to deliver lectures and lead discussions on data-driven science

and technology

topics while developing course materials and aligning content with learning resources
Hosted consistent office hours to assist students with coursework inquiries
Managed administrative responsibilities, including communicating with the professor regarding student performance and attendance records
Currently working part time in instructing weekly basic coding courses to kids in part of an after school program. Some of my tasks are:
Developed student's foundation and understanding of programming using block coding
Planned and organized weekly lesson plans in introducing new coding concepts
